alert.note: Alert for Johnson; Madison; Marion; Morgan; Putnam (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 07 at 3:17AM EST until further notice by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of central Indiana and west central Indiana, including the following counties, in central Indiana, Boone, Hamilton, Hancock, Hendricks, Johnson, Madison, Marion, Morgan and Shelby. In west central Indiana, Owen and Putnam. * WHEN...Until 915 AM EST. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 317 AM EST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Flooding is already occurring in the warned area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Indianapolis, Anderson, Carmel, Fishers, Noblesville, Greenwood, Lawrence, Plainfield, Franklin, Brownsburg, Greenfield, Lebanon, Beech Grove, Zionsville, Martinsville, Speedway, Greencastle, Mooresville, Danville and Southport. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
